contributions.title: Add retry backoff for external API calls
contributions.summary: Exponential backoff and jitter for third-party API client to reduce cascade failures.
contributions.body: When the payment provider times out we were hammering them. This adds configurable retry with backoff.

contributions.title: Review: schema migration
contributions.summary: Approved with suggestions for rollback plan.
contributions.body: LGTM. Can we add a one-line rollback step to the PR description?
